data.title: Aftermath
data.summary: Aftermath also known as Aftermath:Source and initally Zombie Survival is a HL2 mod created using C++ on the Source engine.
data.contents: Aftermath also known as Aftermath:Source and initally Zombie Survival is a HL2 mod created using C++ on the Source engine. It began when I decided to create a game similar to Call of Duty's Zombies mode as I enjoyed playing it and wanted to create something similar, this began with trying to replicate various gameplay features but ended with some custom features to try and seperate itself from the franchise.
